text: DragCon is a drag exposition or fan convention: It could refer to: *RuPaul's DragCon LA, the first expo started in 2015 *Digital DragCon, held online in 2020 in lieu of the LA one canceled due to COVID-19 pandemic *RuPaul's DragCon NYC, started in 2017 *RuPaul's DragCon UK, starting in 2020 *DragCon South Africa, DragCon SA, a company presenting drag queen shows including touring Drag Race performers *DragWorld, a London, England convention *Austin International Drag Festival's Kingfest, a drag king convention *King Con in Ohio, a drag king convention
title: DragCon
